thoughts.text: I think I should start by reviewing the plan provided by my assistant and start breaking down my goals into smaller steps.
thoughts.reasoning: Breaking down my goals into smaller steps will help me focus on one task at a time and make steady progress.
thoughts.plan:
- Review the plan provided by my assistant
- Break down my goals into smaller steps
thoughts.criticism: I should have started breaking down my goals into smaller steps earlier.
thoughts.speak: I will review the plan provided by my assistant and start breaking down my goals into smaller steps.
